title: [Update: Back online] Online dancing comes to a halt: TikTok is currently down
content:
TikTok — the popular social platform amongst teenagers and young adults — is currently down. Users worldwide are facing issues when trying to connect to the service, causing outrage on other social media apps — such as Twitter. It’s still unclear when the company will resolve the issue. So for now, TikTokers will have to

The post [Update: Back online] Online dancing comes to a halt: TikTok is currently down appeared first on xda-developers.
description: TikTok is currently down for users worldwide. Those wanting to access the service will have to wait for an indefinite amount of time.
